LanguageData.Apparel_Vest.label: vest
LanguageData.Apparel_Vest.description: A simple vest, providing a decent layer of insulation from both heat and cold. Greatly enhances social interactions.
LanguageData.Apparel_GreatDress.label: great dress
LanguageData.Apparel_GreatDress.description: A great dress, most often worn by ladies and suffragettes. Greatly enhances social interactions.
